Resistance.help: Grave Knights are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Cold, Negative Energy, Toxic and Psionic damage. He can Hack and Slash with his Rusty Sword and can fire Dark Blasts.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Slow, Cold, Negative, Toxic, Psionic

Dark_Blast.help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Gloom.help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Enchant.help: This Grave Knight has been Enchanted. He can now perform a Disembowel attack and he can cast Gloom.

Head_Splitter.help: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Slash.help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Siphon_Life.help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Siphon Life attack.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Mode2.help: This Grave Knight has been Empowered. His Sword is now magical and more accurate. He can now perform a Head Slitter attack and can Siphon Life.

Empower.help: This Grave Knight has been Empowered. His Sword is now magical and more accurate. He can now perform a Head Slitter attack and can Siphon Life.
